item.title: $ whois hmussana
item.description: Introduction Hi! I am Hassan Mussana. A security guy with super-paranoid instincts, a software engineer (barely), a devsecops advocate, a lover of turn-based strategy games, a grammar nazi, a chai lover, a cook, and a history enthusiast. A SOC analyst turned cloud-sec guy, touching dfir & hunting in between. And now just the guy who wouldn’t approve your PR if things are not aligned or in alphabetical order or have extra spaces.

item.title: Coming soon!!
item.description: # /usr/bin/env python3 print(f"""Coming soon folks. Hold your hourses!""") Output: Coming soon folks. Hold your hourses!
